trans-unit.source: ‘OpenFileMMI’ provides classes for opening dialog frame for a .dat/.bin model file, and output (result) file. It should be imported after ‘sim’ or ‘th’.
trans-unit.target: “ OpenFileMMI”提供用于打开.dat / .bin模型文件的对话框框架和输出（结果）文件的类。应该在“ sim”或“ th”之后导入。

trans-unit.source: ‘epanet’ provides epanet2 python API for win32 (thanks to Assela Pathirana - mailto: assela@pathirana.net) similar to EpanetTools-0.4.0; with epanet.getlinknodes corrected (from 0.9.2).
trans-unit.target: 'epanet'为win32提供epanet2 python API（感谢Assela Pathirana-mailto：assela@pathirana.net），类似于EpanetTools-0.4.0; 更正了epanet.getlinknodes（从0.9.2开始）。

trans-unit.source: ‘geojsonfile’ provides minimal geojson functions similar to shp/dbf shapefile handler (pyshp package).
trans-unit.target: 'geojsonfile'提供的最小geojson函数类似于shp / dbf shapefile处理程序（pyshp软件包）。

trans-unit.source: ‘getter’ functions for individual objects and attributes, time series vectors, attribute vector of all object.
trans-unit.target: 单个对象和属性的“ getter”函数，时间序列向量，所有对象的属性向量。

trans-unit.source: ‘midfile’ provides minimal mif/mid functions similar to shp/dbf shapefile handler (pyshp package).
trans-unit.target: “ midfile”提供的最小mif / mid功能类似于shp / dbf shapefile处理程序（pyshp软件包）。

trans-unit.source: ‘parallel’ provides a simple parallel simulations handling framework based on multiprocessing, returning either elementary or reduced results.
trans-unit.target: “并行”提供了一个基于多处理的简单并行仿真处理框架，返回基本结果或简化结果。

trans-unit.source: ‘plot’ provides easy multiple simulation vs reference graphs plot settings - requires matplotlib.
trans-unit.target: 'plot'提供简单的多重仿真与参考图的绘图设置-需要matplotlib。

trans-unit.source: ‘sim’ package:
‘sort’ provides a heapsort based on heapq.
‘th’ package: same functions for Picalor except running extended period simulations and time series getters.
trans-unit.target: 'th'包：与Picalor相同的功能，除了运行长时间的模拟和时间序列获取器。

trans-unit.source: ‘util’ package: miscellaneous functions.
Windows only

A python package enabling users to call a set of Picwin32.dll or Ganessa_SIM.dll API functions and subroutines within python scripts. Initially provided for python 2.7 32 bits only. 1.9.x versions served as python 3.5 / 3.6 pre-release.
trans-unit.target: 一个 python 包,使用户能够在 python 脚本中调用一组 Picwin32.dll 或 Ganessa_SIM.dll API 函数和子程序。最初只为python 2.7 32位提供。1.9.x版本作为python 3.5/3.6的预发布版本。

trans-unit.source: Content
Documentation
Documentation is provided as pyGanessa.html in the intallation folder.
trans-unit.target: 文件在intallation文件夹中以pyGanessa.html的形式提供。

trans-unit.source: Example
Ganessa_SIM_x64.dll (64 bit dll)
History of the README document
Installation
Model objects and parameters can be modified using Piccolo command language (see cmd, cmdfile and execute).
trans-unit.target: 模型对象和参数可以使用Piccolo命令语言进行修改(参见cmd、cmdfile和execute)。

trans-unit.source: Or one of Ganessa_SIM.dll or Ganessa_TH.dll or Ganessa_SIM_x64.dll in:
Piccolo or Picalor kernel library (picwin32.dll), starting from version 5 (141203) for python 2.7 / version 6 for python 3.x
trans-unit.target: Piccolo或Picalor内核库(picwin32.dll),从python 2.7的第5版(141203)/python 3.x的第6版开始。

trans-unit.source: Piccolo5/Piccolo6/Picalor6 and Ganessa_SIM API python calling interface
trans-unit.target: Piccolo5/Piccolo6/Picalor6 和 Ganessa_SIM API python 调用接口。

trans-unit.source: Python interface to Piccolo and Picalor simulation kernel
Recently introduced functions and classes may not be functional with old versions of Piccolo / Ganessa_SIM kernel.
trans-unit.target: 最近引入的函数和类在旧版本的 Piccolo/Ganessa_SIM 内核中可能无法使用。

trans-unit.source: Requirements (32 bits)
Requirements (64 bits)
Revised 2015-05-03: since 2014-12-04 Picwin32.dll is compatible with this API.
Revised 2016-07-07: provided as .rst.
Revised 2017-08-08: install using pip; Piccolo/Ganessa dll folder search order.
trans-unit.target: 2017-08-08修订:使用pip安装;Piccolo/Ganessa dll文件夹搜索顺序。

trans-unit.source: Revised 2017-09-12: split sim into core, core_sim, core_th.
Revised 2017-11-13: added sort, midfile, epanet modules.
trans-unit.target: 2017-11-13修订:增加排序、中档、易班网模块。

trans-unit.source: Revised 2017-11-30: added parallel.
Revised 2018-03-29: minor changes / extension to python 3.5-3.6.
Revised 2018-06-08: OpenFileMMI and epanet details, added example.
Revised 2018-08-16: 64 bits compatibility (Ganessa_SIM and python 3.7 / 3.8 only).
Revised 2018-08-27: numpy requirements.
Revised 2019-09-13: minor changes.
Revised 2019-10-09: extension to python 3.8.
Revised 2019-10-15: README rst fix.
Revised 2020-02-05: added sim.Graph; README rst fix.

Starting with version 2.0.0, the wheel package is provided for 32 bits version for python 2.7 / 3.5 / 3.6 / 3.7 (Piccolo kernel is a 32 bits application) and 64 bits version for python 3.6 / 3.7 (Ganessa_SIM is available as 32 and 64 bits).
trans-unit.target: 从2.0.0版本开始,轮子包提供了32位版本的python 2.7/3.5/3.6/3.7(Piccolo内核是32位应用)和64位版本的python 3.6/3.7(Ganessa_SIM有32位和64位之分)。

trans-unit.source: Starting with version 2.1.0, the wheel package is provided for 32 bits version for python 2.7 / 3.5 / 3.6 / 3.7 / 3.8 (Piccolo kernel is a 32 bits application) and 64 bits version for python 3.7 / 3.8 (Ganessa_SIM is available as 32 and 64 bits).
trans-unit.target: 从2.1.0版本开始,轮子包提供了32位版本的python 2.7/3.5/3.6/3.7/3.8(Piccolo内核是32位应用)和64位版本的python 3.7/3.8(Ganessa_SIM有32位和64位之分)。

trans-unit.source: The package provides:
This tool expects Picwin32.dll to be in the PATH or in one of the following folders:
trans-unit.target: 该工具希望Picwin32.dll位于PATH或以下文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: What is it?
With custom installations, PICCOLO_DIR or GANESSA_DIR environment variables can be set to define the path.
trans-unit.target: 对于自定义安装,可以设置PICCOLO_DIR或GANESSA_DIR环境变量来定义路径。

trans-unit.source: a Graph class built from the current model graph, with propagation functions.
trans-unit.target: 由当前模型图建立的Graph类,具有传播功能。

trans-unit.source: a few basic functions for reading or loading a model, running hydraulic and WQ simulations.
trans-unit.target: 读取或加载模型、运行水力和WQ模拟的一些基本功能。

trans-unit.source: iterators over links, nodes, tanks, demands, and tables, or over Piccolo command language selections.
trans-unit.target: 迭代链接、节点、油箱、需求和表格,或Piccolo命令语言选择。

trans-unit.source: numpy 1.13.1 or above (python 3.6) / numpy 1.15.1 (python 3.7 / 3.8)
python 3.7 or 3.8
python requirements: numpy 1.11 or above (python 2.7) / numpy 1.13.1 or above (python 3.5 - 3.6) / numpy 1.15.1 (python 3.7 / 3.8)
valid Ganessa_SIM license
valid Piccolo or Picalor or Ganessa_SIM license
